body:
1. You need to check errors and warnings from the report output to see what's happening with your model.

2. I suggest to change your cylinder building to a a polygon based extrusion. That will save you a good amount of simulation time.

3. I'm not clear about last part of your question. In general you can use lableZones to see zone attributes ([https://mostapharoudsari.gitbooks.io/honeybee-primer/content/text/c...](https://mostapharoudsari.gitbooks.io/honeybee-primer/content/text/components/Label_Zones.html))
